content.question: The effect of the passage’s overall structure is to

choices.label: present Ignatius’ thought processes as they occur
describe Ignatius’ gradual realization about another character
draw a comparison between Ignatius and another character
recount how Ignatius reached an important decision

content.answer: present Ignatius’ thought processes as they occur

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
